argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Crowdsale: token is the zero address"

devdoc.details: Extension of ERC20Crowdsale contract whose tokens are minted in each purchase. Token ownership should be transferred to TVTTokenCrowdsale for minting.

buyTokens().details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

returns._0: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.rate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: TVTTokenCrowdsale

setRate(uint256).notice: This function set the rate of token
